Chap. Twenty-Six - Courtesy and Reserve

     Courtesy Begins in the Home. [NOTE: SEE THE ADVENTIST HOME, PP. 421-429, CHAPTER ENTITLED "COURTESY AND KINDNESS."]--Parents, teach your children . . . how to conduct themselves in the home with true politeness. Educate them to show kindness and tenderness to one another. Allow no selfishness to live in the heart or find room in the home.
